Text: "I Got You Babe" is a song written by Sonny Bono.

Text: I Got You Babe:  In 1985, a cover version of "I Got You Babe" by British reggae/pop band UB40 featuring American singer Chrissie Hynde, peaked at number one in the UK Singles Chart and reached number 28 on the US "Billboard" Hot 100 chart.

Triplets:
<Chrissie Hynde
